effect_icon.comment: Property setter required for it to work with BattleUnitcard code with status_list

icon_ladder.componentleveltooltip: This unit is equipped with ladders.

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: Summoned|Summoned units exist in this world on borrowed time and will soon disappear back to the Winds from whence they came.

magic_barrier.componentleveltooltip: Barrier||Barrier health is depleted before unit health when taking damage. The barrier health will slowly replenish when not taking damage. Maximum barrier health is proportional to remaining unit health.

attrition.name: attrition
attrition.tooltip: This unit is suffering attrition due to the ongoing siege.

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.tooltip: This unit is not replenishing because you are bankrupt.

bribe_cost.componentleveltooltip: [PH] This is the amount of gold it costs to bribe this unit
